Ever studied relics? You should give it a try. Archaeology's a fascinating field and more relevant than you might think.

Come on. It's easy!"Well, I've never..."

Fear not! Nothing to it. Look around and collect relic fragments scattered around the entrance of the Stone Pillar Relics and bring them back to me.

There's plenty to recover. If I'm right, they'll unlock a major secret! I might even get a mention in the Velika Guardian or Castanica Chronicle!

I told you it wasn't hard.

These are nice samples. If you ever get tired of soldiering, you've got a solid future in archaeology.

These are fascinating. Let me study them for a bit. Perhaps I'll know better how to proceed from here.
I know it's not glamorous, but forgetting the past is tantamount to dooming our future! Give it a shot!
